name: civility-kernel
description: A modular policy layer that makes agent behavior preference-governed instead of purely efficiency-maximizing.
author: mcp-tool-shop <64996768+mcp-tool-shop@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
